dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
To: +[private] Page 1 of 2 2007-09-04 22:10:31 (GMT) SitePoint Ply Ltd From: [private]
Attn: GooglaRdsense Support DMCAcomplaints
September 4th 2007
The infringing work can be found at:
http:/Ifreedownloadinfo. org/2007/09/04/html-utopia-designing-without-tables-
using-css-2nd-edition-fuII-version/
http:/Itipoe.blogspot.com/2007/09/html-utopia-designing-without-tables.html
http:/Itipoe.blogspot.com/2007/09/dhtml-utopia-modem-web-design-using.html
http://getdownloadlinks.blogspot.com/2007/09/html-utopia-designing-without-
tables.html
http:/Ifreedownloadinfo.org/2007/09/04/html-utopia-designing-without-tables-
using-css-2nd-edition-fuII-version/
http:/Itechnical-ebooks.blogspot.com/2007/09/javascript-anthology-1 01-essential- tips.html
http:/Ifreedownloadinfo. org/2007/09/O4Ithe-javascript-anthology-1 01-essential- tips-tricks-hacksl
http:/Ifreedownloadinfo.org/2007/09/03/dhtml-utopia-modem-web-design-using- javascript-dom/
http://agostic.blogspot.com/2007/09/paperback-592-pages-publisher-
sitepoint.html
Specifically, these sites is making available for download pirated copies of the following SitePoint books:
o HTML Utopia: Designing Without Tables Using CSS
o The JavaScript Anthology: 101 Essential Tips, Tricks & Hacks
o DHTML Utopia: Modern Web Design Using JavaScript
I can be contacted at [private]@sitepoint.com
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
To: +[private] Page 2 of 2 2007-09-04 22:10:31 (GMT) SitePoint Ply Ltd From: [private]
I furthermore believe that the participation of these Websites in the Google
AdSense program violates the publisher terms & conditions which prohibit the illegal distribution of copyrighted material.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is
accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
